coded_answer.p: I am writing this letter to tell you the informationsinformation you need and to ask you one or two questions.
I would like to come in julyJuly because I work infor a big company where you have to take your holiday in thisthat month.

For the accomodationaccommodation at Camp California, I willwould prefer to have a log cabin because I think it is more comfortable than a tent, and in case itthere hasis a big storm with a heavy rain it's. It's. A log cabin's more resistant than a tent.

For the activities, I chose climbing because I took a courscourse duringfor 2 weeks last year and now I have a good level of proficiency, for. For the other one I chose photography but I am not a proffesionalprofessional, I just take some pictures inon my holiday!
I have a little question, could. Could you tell me if and how much money I need to take with me, and whichwhat kind of clothes?
I look forward to hearing from you.
I'm writing this letter to tell you about my good experience at a pop concert, last month.

When I camearrived, I was a bit afraid because I did not know what I had to do, but a very nice girl told me that my first job was lookingto look for people whosewho felt bad and to guide them to the nurserynurse. I did that for two hours , this. This first job was sometimes a bit boring but I felt like someone who savesaves people, so I was really happy!

My second job was to take the money atfrom the bars and to bringtake themit into a little room where I could see the pop starpop stars walkedwalking in the corridor. I was very excited when I could see a star! The nextNext weekend I have an appointmenta date with one of them, but I don'twon't tell you the name because you'll fellfeel jalousjealous! Maybe I will tell you onin the next letter!
